name: bookhaven
tagline: A self-hosted eBook library for organizing, browsing, and tracking reading
description: BookHaven is a self-hosted eBook library designed to organize and manage digital books. It offers an intuitive web interface for browsing, filtering, and tracking reading progress and integrates with OPDS readers.

features.title: Ebook Library
features.description: Organize and manage your digital book collection. Complete cataloging

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Intuitive browsing and filtering through web UI. Easy navigation

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Compatible with OPDS readers for mobile access. Universal compatibility

features.title: Metadata Management
features.description: Automatic book information and cover art. Professional organization

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find books quickly with powerful search. Instant discovery

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your library private on your own server. Complete ownership
